data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Implementation of the dependant or paired t test, a statistical
    test widely used in bio science.

    Statistics::TTest implements the independant t test, a similar
    test, but for use where the two samples of data are unrelated. The
    dependant t test is applied to paired data, such as before and after
    treatment.

    Another statistical test for which no implementation exists on
    CPAN. I beleive this module provides a useful extension to the
    battery of statistical modules available on CPAN.
